pattern.name: Panning Navigator (panning/preview)
pattern.author: Martijn van Welie
pattern.problem: Users need to navigate an area that is larger than the display they use
pattern.context: Reading large texts or viewing maps/images. for example on a Article Page or or even as shown in the example.
pattern.pattlet: Show a preview of the entire image with the currently viewable area marked
pattern.solution: User can change the area they view by dragging the viewable area marking.
